review: Dr Rahul is an amazing surgeon. He explained each and everything to me patiently and helped me calm my worries about the operation. He did an amazing job removing my large dermoid cyst , my post op recovery was quick and as painless as one can expect after surgery time to be. You can trust him 100% !
